docs.snippet: Rodriguez, who has been under much scrutiny since being suspended for a year, has offered Yankees fans a ray of hope with his play so far this season, and they have responded warmly....
docs.lead_paragraph: Rodriguez, who has been under much scrutiny since being suspended for a year, has offered Yankees fans a ray of hope with his play so far this season, and they have responded warmly.
docs.abstract: William C Rhoden Sports of The Times column holds that critics who claim New York Yankees infielder Alex Rodriguez has damaged his legacy by using performance enhancing drugs are not taking into account thousands of fans who seem to be as enamored with him as ever.

headline.main: In the Yankees’ Reality Show, It’s Alex Rodriguez, Flaws and All
headline.print_headline: In Yankees’ Reality Show, It’s Rodriguez, Flaws and All

docs.snippet: HBO has restocked its content cupboard with hits; launched HBO Now, its stand-alone streaming service; and appears to be taking a victory lap....
docs.lead_paragraph: HBO has restocked its content cupboard with hits; launched HBO Now, its stand-alone streaming service; and appears to be taking a victory lap.
docs.abstract: HBO, with Richard Plepler as chief executive, has become leader of the pack in television industry, with hit shows like Game of Thrones and The Jinx, and its success has become vital to success of its parent company, Time Warner; company has introduced standalone streaming service HBO Now to compete with Netflix, Amazon's original programming and other streaming rivals.

headline.main: At the Head of the Pack, HBO Shows the Way Forward

byline.original: By JOHN KOBLIN and EMILY STEEL
